content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW Anomalies_Past_Three_Months
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/Extended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_AnomalyDetection_3mnth.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
